rows.label: qst000502_msg0001
rows.name: Thank you! But Norman-san is[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000502_msg0002
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Ugh... I'm fine... let's
just keep going...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0003
rows.name:
What are you saying?! You can't go
anywhere with an injury like this!
We need to go back to town and[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000502_msg0004
rows.name:
What are YOU saying? We
can't go back to town...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0005
rows.name: B-but[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000502_msg0006
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]I suppose we have no choice
but to rely on you.

rows.label: qst000502_msg0007
rows.name:
The thing is...our marriage
is being opposed.

rows.label: qst000502_msg0008
rows.name:
So we were trying to elope,
and we were heading for Umon's
Shipyard just up ahead.

rows.label: qst000502_msg0009
rows.name:
We thought if we could rent a
boat, we could escape from Gula[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000502_msg0010
rows.name:
In the past, Superbia wiped
out my ancestors' tribe...

rows.label: qst000502_msg0011
rows.name:
That's why my father despises
Superbians so much.

rows.label: qst000502_msg0012
rows.name:
Even though Norman-san and most
Superbians had nothing to do with it[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000502_msg0013
rows.name:
We love each other! Why
should our love be denied?

rows.label: qst000502_msg0014
rows.name:
I can understand where her parents
are coming from, but... Guh!

rows.label: qst000502_msg0015
rows.name: Norman-san! Norman-san! Stay with me!

rows.label: qst000502_msg0016
rows.name: Please! You have to save Norman-san!

rows.label: qst000502_msg0017
rows.name: Thank you!

rows.label: qst000502_msg0018
rows.name:
First, could you gather some Shepherd's
Purses and Dawn Hydrangeas?

rows.label: qst000502_msg0019
rows.name:
Then, if you take them to an
apothecary in Torigo named Nils,
he'll make a medicine for us.

rows.label: qst000502_msg0020
rows.name:
Nils is my brother. He
knows about our elopement,
so he should cooperate[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000502_msg0021
rows.name:
I'll perform first aid while you're
gone. Please, I'm begging you.

rows.label: qst000502_msg0022
rows.name: S-sorry about this... but please...
